mapper.select: SELECT a.earn_total_money, a.earn_reword_money, a.earn_total_money - a.earn_reword_money AS remain_money, (SELECT sum(posted_num) FROM TB_PAINTING WHERE artist_id = #{userId}) as sell_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM TB_REWARD WHERE reward_status = 'R' AND user_id = #{userId}) as request_count FROM TB_USER a where a.user_id = #{userId}

select a.*, (select name from TB_USER where user_id = a.user_id) user_name, case when a.bank = '99' then direct_input_bank else (select code_name from TB_CODE where code_group = 'bank' and code_value = a.bank) end as bank_name from (select from TB_REWARD order by created_date desc) a

select a.*, (select name from TB_USER where user_id = a.user_id) user_name, case when a.bank = '99' then direct_input_bank else (select code_name from TB_CODE where code_group = 'bank' and code_value = a.bank) end as bank_name from (select from TB_REWARD where user_id = #{userId} order by seq desc) a
